oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Thomas A. Shriver, Jr., Counsel for the Nashvile Housing Authority, c.1940s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of Nashville Housing Authority Attorney Thomas A. Shriver, Jr., not dated. Born in Bedford County, Thomas A. Shriver, Jr. served as an attorney, a chancellor, and an appellate court judge. He served on the bench for the Court of Appeals for 40 years, and was insturmental in the establishment of the Tennessee Natural Gas Co. Photographer unknown. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Shriver, Thomas Abraham, Jr., 1892-1986
